author: Epicnoob1002
description: Allows the enemy's to knock back the player if hit. Platform movement mode only bounces the player if the player hits an enemy from the left or right. Top-down bounces in all directions when a player contacts an enemy from any side. The dash lets you dash in your current direction if you have been knocked back the dash will go in the direction you were knocked back in. You can't have both top down and platform dash/ knockback enabled at 1 time
name: Knockback_Dash
shortDescription: Allows the object get knocked back by another object, and makes the object able to dash.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows the player to dash and be knocked back in any direction. Please don't enable top-down and platform mode at the same time.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Knockback_Dash

eventsFunctions.description: allows  the object get knocked back by another object , and makes the object able to dash.
eventsFunctions.name: Knockback_Dash
